bool assertThrows(T : Throwable = Exception, E)(lazy E expression, string msg = T.stringof, string file = __FILE__, int line = __LINE__);
Returns true if the expression throws.

void assertTrue(T, string file = __FILE__, uint line = __LINE__, Args...)(T test, lazy Args args);
A Better assert.
